gems.name: openai-term
gems.info: This is a pretty straight forward interface to OpenAI with the option to select the AI model and the maximum token length (number of maximum words in the AI's response). You will use the -t option to supply the query to OpenAI or the -f option to read the query from a text file instead. New in 1.1.0: Added the opportunity to supply both a text (-t) and a text file (-f) as a query (you can combine the two to e.g. ask openai to describe the content of a file).
